comment: Dr. Pusateri is a great professor. He grades based on a specs chart which is hard to understand at first. You do not need a textbook because we read actual articles that are all online. There is 300 word article analysis due twice a week but honestly they are not hard to do. Love him and would take him again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Absolutely loved this professor! He was an amazing lecturer and offered inspirational insight into psychology's darkest of theories. He is a tough grader on test and essays, but in the end you'll be glad you took him! Comments are time consuming, but are well worth the inside knowledge. Be prepared to work (but you'll enjoy every second of it)!

He is a pretty cool professor.  Loves what he teaches and it shows.  He wants you to succeed and will do what he can to help you do so.  Go to class and don't be late! If you're late you will only get 1 point.  Do the extra credit work, it's easy and will help you.  Study the essay questions and you will have no problem with the exam. He's funny
I might not have gotten the best grade, but is was not from lack of this teaching. He is one of the reasons I changed my major to psychology!!

I loved this professor!! His Theories class isn't an easy A, but his passion and knowledge of the material makes you want to learn. He gives amazing, detailed feedback on your papers and is very helpful. He is definitely one of my favorite professors at KSU.
Best class and best professor I have ever had! Such a nice guy and very straight forward with what he wants on tests, papers, etc. I would definitely take him again!

These comments make him seem AWFUL and he's not at all. Very nice man, really enjoys his job and teaching! Picky on the tests but he explains during class the essential parts of the essay answers that he is looking for so if you're in class and ask questions for clarity, you're fine! Wants u to understand and succeed!

I was an extra points from a "C". He is very picky about essays and on exams.The exam was difficult we had multiple cchoice and 4 essays.He is picky for what he wants..He wants u to restate what he wants and material that h thinks is right.PLEASE dont take him...he is not reasonable.

I will never take this professor again. I was 9 points away from a B, and he would not bump my grade. He does not explain what he is looking for. SocialPsychology could have been the best class I had ever taken, if it wasn't for him.There are so many other professors teaching this course choose one them, but not Pusateri.DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR.
